sentences.sContent: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.sCn: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.sContent: ...we decide whether we are superior or inferior to others on certain dimensions...
...We are not about to go back to the days when Congress openly worried about inferior races polluting America’s bloodstream...
...Romanians and members of other so-called inferior races became exemplary Americans and contributed greatly...

synos.tran: 差的；自卑的；[植]下级的，下等的

remMethod.val: infer(推断) ＋ ior → 推断的东西是次要的， 事实才是依据 → 下等的
